DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis examine dietary LCP-supplementation second third year life improve cognitive visual maturation early childhood .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Long-Chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acid Supplementation Toddler Cognition
DOC.detailed_description: A total number 114 toddler 12 month ± 2 week age recruit randomize two group ( placebo LCP-supplemented ) . Cognition , visual function , anthropometric , immunologic biochemical status , health assess upon entry evaluate equality study group . The primary outcome measure Part A maturation cognition 24 month ± 2 week age ( 12 month LCP dietary intervention ) assess Bayley Scales Infant Development ( BSID ) -version III . In Part B , maturation cognition 36 month age ( 24 month LCP dietary intervention ) assess use Wechsler Preschool Primary Scale Intelligence ( WPPSI-III ) . The study supplement ( 1 ) micro-encapsulated powder contain 1:1 ratio omega-3 fatty acid , docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) omega-6 fatty acid , arachidonic acid ( ARA ) algal fungal source , respectively ; ( 2 ) micro-encapsulated powder contain corn oil placebo . Two foil-packets contain either active intervention placebo provide 200mg DHA 200mg ARA 400 mg placebo oil per day toddler . Two packet powder add day selection recommend food ( e.g. , yogurt ) . The duration treatment 12 24 month age Part A Part B 24 36 month follow 42 month age . Secondary outcome measure : - COGNITION : Peabody Picture Vocabulary Test ( PPVT-II ; 42 mo ) Bracken Basic Concept Scale ( 42 mo ) . - VISION : Grating & stereoacuity ( 12 , 24 & 36 mo ) ; letter acuity 36 mo . - ANTHROPOMETRICS , HEALTH INDICES & DIETARY STATUS : Weight , height , head circumference , waist & hip measure , body mass index ( BMI ) , skin fold fat deposition , heart rate ( HR ) , blood pressure ( BP ) , omega-3-targeted food questionnaire ( 12,18 , 24 , 30 , 36 , & 42 mo ) , childhood illness birth 36 month emphasis allergy asthma chart review questionnaire determine family history asthma allergy well child 's exposure smoking ( 12 , 24 & 36 mo ) . - EXECUTIVE FUNCTION : Behavior Rating Inventory Executive Function - Preschool Version ( BRIEF-P questionnaire ; 24 & 36 mo ) , Kansas Reflection-Impulsivity Scale Preschoolers ( KRISP ; 42 mo ) , Dimensional Change Card Sort ( DCCS ; 42 mo ) , three Stroop Tasks ( 42 mo ) , Grass/Snow task ( 42 month ) , Day/Night Task ( 42 month ) . - SLEEP : Brief Infant Sleep Questionnaire ( BSIQ ; 12 & 24 mo ) , Children 's Sleep Habits Questionnaire ( CSHQ ; 36 & 42 mo ) . - IMMUNE FUNCTION : plasma cytokine level ( 12 & 24 mo ) , skin prick test specific IgEs ( 12 & 24 mo ) , plasma total IgE , salivary ( secretory ) IgA ( 12 & 24 mo ) , plasma C-reactive protein ( CRP ; 12 & 24 mo ) . - INDICES OF NEURAL TISSUE COMPOSITION AND COMPLIANCE : Total RBC fatty acid analysis ( 12 & 24 mo ) , buccal cheek cell phospholipid fatty acid analysis ( 12 , 24 , & 36 mo ) .
DOC.criteria: Toddlers ( 12 month ± 2 week age randomization ) . Breastfed formulafed first 12 month life . Mother plan discontinue breastfeeding/formula feed 13 month age . Fullterm birth ( 3742 week postconception ) . English primary language home . History underlying disease congenital malformation , opinion Investigator , likely interfere normal growth development participant evaluation participant . Toddler weigh < 5 % > 95 % normative value Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) growth chart release 2000 ( www.cdc.gov/growthcharts/ ) . Evidence poor food intake time randomization . Parent ( ) currently supplement plan supplement child > 100 mg DHA per day ( fish , fish oil , capsule chewables ) .
